## Constructor Function

Not shown here: I have added roxygen comments to generate R Documentation for 
the constructor and print functions, and imported my used functions from 
their respective packages.

``` {r source}
ttest.rjs::Rttest
ttest.rjs:::print.Rttest
```


## Execution Test

As shown below the the class of `obj` is `"Rttest"`. Additionally the print statement 
returns a the kable interpretation of the data.frame `data` .

``` {r test}
set.seed(21);x <-rnorm(30,5,2); set.seed(23); y<- rnorm(30, 3,2); alpha <- 0.05
obj <-ttest.rjs::Rttest(x=x,y=y,alpha = 0.05)
library(ttest.rjs)
print(obj)
```
